Replace.Text: +{1_num} [ICON_Faith] 信仰值来自相邻种植园{1_Num : plural 1?单元格; other?单元格;}。
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith from the adjacent Plantation {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] 信仰值来自相邻牧场{1_Num : plural 1?单元格; other?单元格;}。
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith from the adjacent Pasture {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] 食物来自相邻冻土{1_Num : plural 1?单元格; other?单元格;}。
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food from the adjacent Tundra {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] 食物来自相邻冻土丘陵{1_Num : plural 1?单元格; other?单元格;}。
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food from the adjacent Tundra Hill {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] 信仰值来自相邻冻土丘陵{1_Num : plural 1?单元格; other?单元格;}。
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith from the adjacent Tundra Hill {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] 信仰值来自相邻河流。
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith from the adjacent River.
该宗教每有3个信徒则+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every three followers of this Religion.
该宗教每有3个信徒则+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰。
+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for every 3 followers of this Religion.
该宗教每有3个信徒则+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值。
+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for every 3 followers of this Religion.
该宗教每有3个信徒则+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
+1 [ICON_Science] Science for every 3 followers of this Religion.
每个信奉该宗教的城市+6 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
+6 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each city following this Religion.
每个信奉该宗教的城市+3 [ICON_Culture] 文化。
+3 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each city following this Religion.
每个信奉该宗教的城市+3 [ICON_Faith] 信仰。
+3 [ICON_Faith] Faith for each city following this Religion.
每个信奉该宗教的城市+3 [ICON_Science] 科技。
+3 [ICON_Science] Science for each city following this Religion.
入会仪式
Initiation Rites
利用宗教单位使城市首次改变信仰时，该城市每拥有1点 [ICON_Citizen] 人口，则提供50点 [ICON_Gold] 金币（标准速度下）。
When you use a religious unit to convert a city for the first time earn 50 [ICON_Gold] Gold per [ICON_Citizen] Population of that city (on Standard Speed).
将一个 [ICON_ENVOY]使者派遣至城邦后，将对该城邦施加200点宗教压力。征兵费用减少20%。除了城邦的任务外，城邦信教将自动向该城邦派遣1 [ICON_Envoy] 使者。

When you send an [ICON_ENVOY] Envoy to a City-State it adds 200 Religious pressure to that City-State.Reduced levy army cost by 20 percent. +1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy at each City-State when it first adopts this Religion, in addition to any envoy from a City-State quest.
信仰此宗教且拥有世界奇观的每座城市+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、[ICON_CULTURE] 文化值、[ICON_GOLD] 金币和 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。
+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and [ICON_FAITH] Faith for each city following this Religion that has a World Wonder.
荣神益人
To the Glory of God
招募伟人-25% [ICON_faith] 信仰值花费。 每次招募伟人时，获得50 [ICON_FAVOR] 外交支持。每当一位伟人完全激活或隐退后，有33%的几率获得一个 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物。

-25% [ICON_faith] faith when you patronage great person. Each time you recruit a great person , add 50 [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor. 33% chance getting a [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic when a great person is fully activated or retired.
每座神社和寺庙提供的 [ICON_FOOD] 食物+3，[ICON_HOUSING] 住房+2。
Shrines and Temple provide +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +2 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing each.
神社和寺庙提供的 [ICON_Culture] 文化值等于其固定产出的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。
Shrines and Temples provide [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to their intrinsic [ICON_Faith] Faith output.
所有世界奇观+4 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。圣地区域的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值相邻加成提供额外等量的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。完成世界奇观后返还等同于奇观所需产能一半的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。

All world wonders provide +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Holy Site provides extra [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to the district adjacency bonus.Each time gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal t0 50% production cost after Wonder construction.
信奉该宗教的城市，每 [ICON_Citizen] 人口提供0.5 [ICON_Science] 科技值。 可以使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买学院区域内的建筑。
Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen yields 0.5 [ICON_Science] Science in cities that follow this Religion. May purchase Campus district buildings with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
[ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物能产出3倍的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值和 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。神社和寺庙提供的 [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩等于其固定产出的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。

[ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics have triple yield of both [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism. Shrines and Temples provide [ICON_Tourism] Tourism equal to their intrinsic [ICON_Faith] Faith output.
国际 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线为拥有“圣地”的城市+2 [ICON_GOLD] 金币；圣地区域中每有一座建筑，此 [ICON_GOLD] 金币加成便+2。可用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买商人，用 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值和 [ICON_GOLD] 金币购买商人的费用降低20%。寺庙提供一条免费的商路容量。

International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes provide +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold to cities with Holy Sites and an additional +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every building in the Holy Site district. May purchase trader units with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Trader are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_FAITH] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Temple provides a trade route capacity.
宗教艺术
Religious Art
圣地区域的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值相邻加成也提供 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。可以使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买剧院广场区域建筑。
Holy Site district’s [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency bonus provides [ICON_Culture] Culture as well. May purchase Theater district buildings with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
信奉该宗教的城市，每 [ICON_Citizen] 人口提供0.3 [ICON_Production] 生产力。信教城市中的每个信徒+1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。
Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen yields 0.3 [ICON_Production] Production in cities that follow this Religion. +1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for each follower in this city.
经世致用
Practical Application
信奉该宗教的城市，每 [ICON_Citizen] 人口提供1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。 信教城市中的每个信徒+1% [ICON_Gold] 金币产出。
Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen yields 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold in cities that follow this Religion.+1% [ICON_Gold] Gold for each follower in this city.
用 [ICON_GOLD] 金币购买开拓者和建造者的费用降低20%，若可用[ICON_FAITH] 信仰值购买，则也降低20% 。可以使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买政府区和外交区建筑。

Settlers and Buildiers are 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and 20% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_FAITH] Faith when allowed. May purchase Government district and Diplomatic Quarter district buildings with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
若圣地相邻山脉，+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度；相邻森林，+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度；相邻河流，+2 [ICON_housing] 住房。市中心也获得相同加成。

+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity if the Holy Site is adjacent to mountains.+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity if the Holy Site is adjacent to Forests.+2 [ICON_Housing] Housing if the Holy Site is adjacent to river.So as the City Center.
经院哲学
Scholasticism
所有宗教单位在神学战斗中+7 [ICON_Religion] 宗教战斗力。
All Religious units +7 [ICON_Religion] Religious Strength in theological combat.
虔诚商队
Pious Merchants
来自 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线的宗教压力+100%。
+100% Religious pressure from your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.
弥赛亚
Messiah
使徒首次升级时将额外获得1次升级。
Apostles receive 1 extra promotion when receiving their first promotion.
册封圣徒
Canonization of Saints
当您激活一位 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人时，其会将您所创立宗教的400点宗教压力传播到6单元格内的城市。
When you activate a [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person they spread 400 Religious pressure of your founded religion to cities within 6 tiles.
战斗单位处于信奉该宗教的友好城市境内时+3 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
Combat units gain +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when within the borders of friendly cities that follow this Religion.
战斗单位处于信奉该宗教的外国城市境内时+7 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
Combat units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when within the borders of foreign cities that follow this Religion.
你的所有单位在圣地区域（其所属城市须信仰你的主流宗教）或任意相邻单元格中的生命值回复量+20。
Increases Healing of your all units by +20 in Holy Site districts belonging to cities with your majority religion, or any adjacent tiles.
您的宗教压力不会因为神学战斗失败而减少。减少100%外来宗教压力影响，审判官+1使用次数，购买审判官打折-30%。
Your Religion's pressure never drops due to losses in Theological Combat. -100% outer religion pressure. Inquisitors receive +1 charge. -30% purchase cost for Inquisitors.
允许建造清真寺（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；此处创建的传教士和使徒+1传教次数；所有从本城创建的宗教单位在宗教战争中+3力）。

Allows construction of Mosques (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, Missionary and Apostles created here have +1 spread; All Religious units created in this city receive +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in religious combats).
允许建造宝塔（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，+3 [ICON_Culture] 文化值；本城+10% [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值）。
Allows construction of Pagodas (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this city).
允许建造佛寺（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，+3 [ICON_Science] 科技值；本城+10% [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值）。
Allows construction of Wats (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +3 [ICON_Science] Science; +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in this city).
允许建造犹太教堂（+5 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；本城+10% [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值）。
Allows construction of Synagogues (+5 [ICON_Faith] Faith; +10% [ICON_FAITH] Faith in this city).
允许建造谒师所（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，+3 [ICON_Food] 食物，+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房；本城+10%人口增长速度）。
Allows construction of Gurdwaras (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +3 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing; +10% Growth rate in this city).
允许建造礼拜堂（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，+3 [ICON_Production] 生产力；在生产奇观、区域、建筑时本城+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力）。
Allows construction of Meeting Houses (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +3 [ICON_Production] Production; +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in this city towards Wonders, Districts and Buildings).
允许建造窣堵波（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值、+2 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度；本城每种已开发的奢侈品 +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] 宜居度）。
Allows construction of Stupas (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity; Receive 1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for every Luxury resource this city has improved).
允许建造大教堂（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，可放置1个宗教艺术巨作或者雕塑；存放的雕塑和艺术巨作+3 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值，且产出的 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩+100%）。
Allows construction of Cathedrals (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, 1 slot for Religious Art or Sculpture; +3 [ICON_FAITH] Faith and +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism for innner Great Work).
允许建造拜火神庙（+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值；建造或上次修复后的每个时代均额外+1 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值；完成后，获得一个传教士）。
Allows construction of Dar-e Mehrs (+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +1 additional [ICON_FAITH] Faith for each era since constructed or last repaired; Gain a Missionary unit after finishing construction).
